description:
This policy configures the alignment of the Start menu and taskbar icons on Windows 11 devices.

When set to Left:

The Start button and app icons are aligned to the bottom-left corner of the taskbar—similar to the traditional layout from Windows 10 and earlier.

This setting offers a familiar user experience for organizations migrating from legacy Windows environments.

The configuration is enforced at the device level, preventing users from changing the Start menu alignment through personal settings.
name: BHC - Windows - Start Menu Left Align
